title: MTGGoldfish
description:
Magic the Gathering decks, reviews and product openings! The official channel for MTGGoldfish. Visit us at http://www.mtggoldfish.com.

Upload schedule for Major Series:
Sunday: Meme or Dream? 
Monday: Budget Magic, MTGGoldfish Podcast
Tuesday: Arena Series with Crim
Wednesday: Against the Odds
Thursday: Arena Series with Crim
Friday: Much Abrew About Nothing
Saturday: Arena Series with Crim

videos.author: MTGGoldfish
videos.title: We Found a Way For Yuna to Go Even Bigger In Standard
videos.description:
The meta isn't as aggro and we're adding blue and going Bant Yuna to play counter magic and use Ignis to ramp even harder so we can naturally cast our giant bombs! 

Today's video is brought to you by Card Kingdom. You can pick up some Magic: the Gathering cards (and help support the show) at https://www.cardkingdom.com/mtggoldfish

► Read more about this deck (full article): https://www.mtggoldfish.com/articles/single-scoop-we-found-a-way-for-yuna-to-go-even-bigger-in-standard
► View this deck with the latest prices: https://www.mtggoldfish.com/deck/7220569#paper

◼ Purchase this deck (paper): http://mtg.fish/FQoqK
◼ Purchase this deck (Magic Online): http://mtg.fish/urahb

videos.author: MTGGoldfish
videos.title: Free Spells for Everyone, Crazy Reanimator Uncommon and More  Daily Edge of Eternities MTG Spoilers
videos.description:
Today in Edge of Eternities we get an enchantment that let's everyone cast things for free, a wild reanimating uncommon, Urza at home and more! Let's discuss!

Need Edge of Eternities cards? https://www.cardkingdom.com/mtggoldfish

Need more spoilers? https://www.mtgpreviews.com

#MTG #MagictheGathering #MTGEOE #mtgspoilers
